quote: We're really trying to build a platform where the agents can pick the brokerage plan they want.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the flexibility and agent-centric approach of the Pinnacle model.
suggested_hook: Are you tired of one-size-fits-all brokerage models?

quote: There's always people moving and selling houses, even if there's less transactions.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to stay proactive and find opportunities in any market.
suggested_hook: Worried about a slow market? Here's why you shouldn't be.
